title: Model-debug
code: geom_path="G:/data/ras_catalog/_temp/BLE/12090301/12090301_models/Model/Walnut Creek-Colorado River/CEDAR CREEK/CEDAR CREEK.g01" units="Foot" proj_string="EPSG:2277" in_epoch_override = as.integer(as.POSIXct(Sys.time())) out_epoch_override = as.integer(as.POSIXct(Sys.time())) vdat_trans=FALSE quiet=FALSE default_g=FALSE try_both=TRUE # extrated_pts <- parse_model_to_xyz(geom_path=geom_path, #                                    units=units, #                                    proj_string=proj_string, #                                    in_epoch_override = as.integer(as.POSIXct(Sys.time())), #                                    out_epoch_override = as.integer(as.POSIXct(Sys.time())), #                                    vdat_trans=vdat_trans, #                                    quiet=quiet, #                                    default_g=default_g, #                                    try_both=try_both) extrated_pts <- try({   parse_model_to_xyz(geom_path=geom_path,                      units=units,                      proj_string=proj_string,                      in_epoch_override = as.integer(as.POSIXct(Sys.time())),                      out_epoch_override = as.integer(as.POSIXct(Sys.time())),                      vdat_trans=vdat_trans,                      quiet=quiet,                      default_g=default_g,                      try_both=try_both) }) if(nrow(extrated_pts[[1]])==0){   current_initial_name <- paste0("unknown_",current_model_name,"_",current_g_value,"_",current_last_modified)   current_final_name_key <- NA    if(sum(stringr::str_detect(na.omit(ras_catalog_dbase$initial_scrape_name), current_initial_name)) == 0) {     new_row <- data.table::data.table(current_nhdplus_comid,                                       current_model_name,                                       current_g_value,                                       current_last_modified,                                       code_to_place_in_source,                                       current_model_units,                                       current_model_projection,                                       current_initial_name,                                       current_final_name_key,                                       "unparsed_units_proj")     names(new_row) <- names     ras_catalog_dbase <- data.table::rbindlist(list(ras_catalog_dbase,new_row))      dir.create(file.path(path_to_ras_dbase,"models","_unprocessed",current_initial_name,fsep = .Platform$file.sep), showWarnings = FALSE, recursive = TRUE)     file.copy(c(g_file ,paste0(g_file,".hdf") ,p_files ,f_files ,h_files, v_files, prj_files,o_files,r_files,u_files,x_files,rasmap_files),               file.path(path_to_ras_dbase,"models","_unprocessed",current_initial_name,fsep = .Platform$file.sep))     data.table::fwrite(ras_catalog_dbase,file.path(path_to_ras_dbase,"accounting.csv",fsep = .Platform$file.sep), row.names = FALSE)     process_count = process_count + 1   } else {     if(!quiet) { print("Model with inital scrape name already in the que") }     duplicate_count = duplicate_count + 1   }   next() }  # Footprint the points we extracted ls = sfheaders::sf_linestring(   obj = extrated_pts[[1]]   , x = "x"   , y = "y"   # , z = "z"   , linestring_id = "xid"   , keep = FALSE ) |> sf::st_set_crs(sf::st_crs("EPSG:6349")) # if(quick_hull) {   end_points <- c(ls %>% lwgeom::st_endpoint(), ls %>% lwgeom::st_startpoint())   end_points <- sf::st_coordinates(end_points) %>%     as.data.frame(extrated_pts[[1]]) %>%     dplyr::group_by(X,Y) %>%     dplyr::distinct() %>%     sf::st_as_sf(coords = c("X","Y")) %>%     sf::st_set_crs(sf::st_crs("EPSG:6349")) %>%     sf::st_transform(sf::st_crs("EPSG:4326")) } else {   end_points <- sf::st_coordinates(ls) %>%     as.data.frame(extrated_pts[[1]]) %>%     dplyr::group_by(X,Y) %>%     dplyr::distinct() %>%     sf::st_as_sf(coords = c("X","Y")) %>%     sf::st_set_crs(sf::st_crs("EPSG:6349")) %>%     sf::st_transform(sf::st_crs("EPSG:4326")) }  ahull_poly = holyhull::holyhull(sf_frame=end_points, method='convave', alpha_value=0.01, concavity = 2, length_threshold = 0)  flowline_list <- try({   nhdplusTools::get_nhdplus(AOI::aoi_get(ahull_poly),realization = "flowline") })  # Join to comids if(length(flowline_list) == 0) {   current_nhdplus_comid = 2 } else {   current_nhdplus_comid = flowline_list[flowline_list$streamorde == max(flowline_list$streamorde),][1,]$comid }

text: HEC-RAS model format, stand alone models archive formats, incomparable end users whose use case includes widespread accounting deployment data inputs workflows. tool deployed ingest HEC-RAS models “RAS_model_catalog”, normalized spatialized representation models requisite metadata formatting needed mesh seamlessly national scale hydrofabric efforts data models, applications T-Route RAS2FIM.

title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: hydraulic models prolific HEC-RAS, since ’s first named release 1995 users created models using public private data countless hours engineering scrutinization order generate best possible purpose-built representation world. Like model, level input massaging necessary order get data specified mathematical format model requires. Like domain specific software solutions, massaging rather, forceful, point permanently altering shape inputs something geospatial data readers unable handle. creates great deal friction terms model accountability interoperability, particularly take standpoint model consumer. R based HEC-RAS Wrestler (RRASSLER) mediate .

title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: order wrassle friction, RRASSLER theoretical value judgments need described order help understand use properly. RRASSLER focused making critical data objects needed run HEC-RAS model readily available accountable model (opposed individual data points large clusters otherwise “vistigal” data; emphasis particular geometric realization model). also designed standardized centralized source models, regardless origin. reason, RRASSLER expects operate within ’s controlled directory, “HECRAS_model_catalog”. Users first download unpack desired models temporary location, point RRASSLER directory place want store catalog. : 1) Scrape entire directory structure HEC-RAS model projects 2) geometric realization model (variation .g##), grab files : Attempt place model space. done attempting parse g** g**.hdf files, guess projections, pulling collating data xid-xyz table. Using extracted geometry, attempt create model footprint (hull). can constructed, model assumed correctly placed space. relevant model files copied uniquely parsed “final_model_name_key” folder /models/ folder. creation model hull errors , model placed _/models/unprocessed folder investigation, correction, rewrassling. iterations files done, RRASSLER (re)generate unified source model footprints, cross sections, points (now spatial form) HEC-RAS model, pointers back copied source data remains unaltered.
